org.ldaptive.provider.apache

Class ApacheLdapUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ldaptive.provider.apache.ApacheLdapUtils

  • public class ApacheLdapUtils
extends Object
    Provides methods for converting between Apache Ldap specific objects and ldaptive specific objects.

    • Field Summary

      Fields

      Attributes that should be treated as binary.
